mapper.insert: insert into attachment(attachment_no, attachment_name, attachment_type, attachment_size) values(#{attachmentNo}, #{attachmentName}, #{attachmentType}, #{attachmentSize})
mapper.select: select * from attachment order by attachment_no desc

select faa.attachment_no, faa.attachment_name, faa.attachment_type, faa.attachment_size, faa.attachment_date from freeboard f left outer join (select * from freeboard_attachment fa inner join attachment a on fa.freeboard_attachment_no = a.attachment_no) faa on f.freeboard_no = faa.freeboard_origin_no where f.freeboard_no = #{freeboardAttachmentNo}

select a.ahzit_no, iaa.attachment_no, iaa.attachment_name, iaa.attachment_type, iaa.attachment_size, iaa.attachment_date from ahzit a left outer join (select * from ahzit_attachment aa inner join attachment a on aa.ahzit_attachment_no = a.attachment_no) iaa on a.ahzit_no = iaa.ahzit_origin_no where ahzit_origin_no= #{ahzitOriginNo}

select iaa.attachment_no, iaa.attachment_name, iaa.attachment_type, iaa.attachment_size, iaa.attachment_date from inquire i left outer join (select * from inquire_attachment ia inner join attachment a on ia.inquire_attachment_no = a.attachment_no) iaa on i.inquire_no = iaa.inquire_origin_no where i.inquire_no = #{inquireAttachmentNo}

select aaia.attachment_no, aaia.attachment_name, aaia.attachment_type, aaia.attachment_size, aaia.attachment_date from ahzit_member am inner join (select * from attachment inner join ahzit_in_attachment on attachment_no = ahzit_in_attachment_no) aaia on am.member_no = aaia.ahzit_in_member_no where am.member_ahzit_no = #{memberAhzitNo}
